#include<iostream>
#include<stdio.h>
#include<algorithm>
#include<string.h>
#include<vector>
#include<math.h>
#include<stack>
#include<queue>
using namespace std;
/*long long gcd(long long a,long long b)
{
    while(b)
    {
        long long r=a%b;
        a=b;
        b=r;
    }
    return a;
}
signed long long choose(int n,int k)
{
    if(k==0)
        return 1;
    else
    {
        long long f=1;
        int i;
        if(k>n-k)
            k=n-k;
        int p=1;
        while(p<=k)
        {
            f*=n--;
            f/=p++;
        }
        return f;
    }
}*/
int main()
{
  int t;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        int n,k,ctr=0,ctrmax=0;
        scanf("%d%d",&n,&k);
        long long a[n+1];
        int i;
        for(i=0;i<n;i++)
            scanf("%lld",&a[i]);
        sort(a,a+n);
        ctr=1;
        for(i=1;i<n;i++)
        {
            if(a[i]==a[i-1])
                ctr++;
            else
            {
                if(ctr>ctrmax)
                    ctrmax=ctr;
                ctr=1;
            }
        }
        if(ctr>ctrmax)
            ctrmax=ctr;
        if(ctrmax>=k)
            printf("0\n");
        else
            printf("%d\n",k-ctrmax);
    }
    return 0;
}
